reviews.text: Barnsley is Poor.The train station is not big nuff because it needs a another Platform for Transpennine Express because Northern rail just goes to Huddersfield,Nottingham,Sheffield, Meadowhall, Leeds. Why? Can it Be Manchester airport and York,Newcastle.But Queues are Big for the Trains to Leeds from Barnsley. Why? Can Northern  add more Coaches to the train and extend the Platform for more people to get on.
Like one big greenhouse in the summer
Very helpful and lovely staff, couldn’t thank more!
This station, being an interchange, has comfortable seats. The comfort soon dissolves if you have a long waiting on a cold night! There are no doors to keep the cold out.
What a dump Barnsley is. Hope it gets better. Cant get any worse. Alhambra toilets  and areas very good.  Eldon St disgusting.
